<p>
I am a PhD student at the QUT Centre for Data Science (2022-2025 planned finish). My general area of research is on computational Bayesian statistics.
</p>
<p>
My specific thesis focus is on addressing model misspecification for neural simulation-based inference methods.
</p>
<p>
Other research interests include open-source software development, generative models, out-of-distribution generalisation, and probability theory.
</p>
